articles.title: Barstool's Dave Portnoy fumes over firing of staffer over rap lyric slur: 'I hate the decision'
articles.description: Barstool founder Dave Portnoy said parent company, Penn Entertainment, forced him fire personality Ben Mintz for accidentally rapping the “n-word."
articles.content: Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy said parent company, Penn Entertainment, forced him fire popular personality Ben Mintz for rapping the "n-word" during a live show because it feared government re… [+4845 chars]
